dcterms:description: A public MRI dataset from the MICCAI 2017 challenge, which includes 150 patients with segmentation labels of three organs: left ventricle, right ventricle, and myocardium.
dcterms:title: 2017 ACDC dataset

dcterms:description: An in-house CT dataset containing 130 rectum cancer patients with segmentation labels of four organs: bladder, small intestine, right femoral head, and left femoral head.
dcterms:title: RC-OARs dataset
